entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 11:49 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

Temperature: -2.5°C

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 99 %

Dewpoint: -2.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
